text: Bend of the River is a 1952 American western movie directed by Anthony Mann and was based on the 1950 novel of the same name by Bill Gulick. It stars James Stewart, Arthur Kennedy, Julie Adams, Rock Hudson, Lori Nelson, Howard Petrie, Chubby Johnson, Harry Morgan and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Anthony Mann
title: Bend of the River
